lead_paragraph: Montreal coach Michel Therrien made a minor tweak to his lineup and it worked so well the Canadiens tied a 63-year-old franchise record.

headline.print_headline: Price Makes 24 Saves as Montreal Beats the Kings 4-1
headline.main: Price Makes 24 Saves as Montreal Beats the Kings 4-1
